Author: daemonfox#6136
Content: Except, when you are a multi KMD asset staker in AGAMA, and stake and mine VRSC in AGAMA. The AGAMA UI wont spawn a second instance and you cant replace the needed files while other assets are live, nor launch those assets while LABS files are in place because that was advised against... staking or mining other coins on the LABS binaries.

Author: daemonfox#6136
Content: This for now lets me do all of that but leave LABS in a non AGAMA UI
